mapper.select: SELECT comments.comment_id as commentID, comments.board_id as boardID, comments.post_id as postID, comments.user_id as userID, users.user_name as userName, comments.company_id as companyID, comments.comment_content as commentContent, comments.comment_register_time as commentRegisterTime, comments.comment_referenced_id as commentReferencedID FROM Comments comments , Users users where comments.user_id = users.user_id AND comments.post_id = #{postID} AND comments.comment_referenced_id is not null;
